episodes.title: Jehovah's Witnesses Play Victim After Woman Dies Refusing Blood - 2024 Convention Response Part 3
episodes.description:
In this video, I discuss a shocking segment from the 2024 Jehovah's Witnesses' "Declare the Good News" Convention Talk "Use the Good News to Defeat Bad News - Harmful Gossip". In this talk, the Jehovah's Witnesses leadership claim to be the victims of unfair criticism, harmful gossip and lies after a Jehovah's Witness woman dies during childbirth as a result of refusing a blood transfusion. I comment on the religion's leadership's lack of empathy and regret for this unnecessary loss of life and discuss why this indicates that the leadership have no appetite for reversing this shocking policy.

#jehovahswitnesses #convention #bloodtransfusion 

Chaka Yumba is an ex-Jehovah's Witness elder, regular pioneer, SKE graduate and HLC member. This channel is a resource for anyone interested in scrutinising the beliefs of Jehovah's Witnesses and gaining an insight into how decisions are reached by Jehovah's Witness elders.

episodes.title: What's In The Mysterious August 2024 Watchtower?
episodes.description:
Rather bizarrely, the Jehovah's Witnesses leadership have failed to publish the August 2024 issue of their flagship magazine, the Watchtower. True to form, they have opted not to be upfront with their members and have secretly informed the elders that the September and October 2024 issues of the Watchtower will be published prior to the August issue (as per the S-147 announcements for June 2024). Arthur and I discuss why we do not expect this Watchtower issue to have any new doctrines and / or policies and what we expect to see in it.

episodes.description:

The HLC is the organisational structure that the Jehovah's Witnesses Governing Body uses to police ordinary Jehovah's Witnesses' adherence to the prohibition of the use of blood for medical purposes.

In this episode I discuss the process of my recruitment onto the HLC and the elevated status it gave me in the local Jehovah's Witnesses community.

episodes.title: Vol 1 Ep 1: Did Moses Really Write The Pentateuch?
episodes.description:
Moses is traditionally attributed as the author of the Pentateuch (Genesis, Exodus, Leviticus, Number and Deuteronomy). But did Moses really write these books? What does the Bible's internal evidence suggest? And what do scholars have to say on this subject. Join Chaka as he delves into this fascinating and intriguing subject.

The uhHoly Bible Project is available in podcast format on your favourite podcast listening app.

Future episodes of this show will be posted on this channel: https://youtube.com/@unHolyBibleProject?si=sQHkvdQP5DhI3hw_

The slides used in this presentation are available here: https://anthonymorrisreturns.jwinfo.ro/files/unHoly%20Bible%20Project%20Episode%201.pptx

You can view the Open Yale Introduction To Hebrew Bible Course Here: https://oyc.yale.edu/religious-studies/rlst-145

You can view the Open Yale Introduction to New Testament Course Here: https://oyc.yale.edu/religious-studies/rlst-152

You can view view the Yale Hebrew Bible Interpretation lectures here: https://youtu.be/OZIm_edPz20?si=n5y1z92Vl87p1g59

#bible #scholarship #pentateuch 

This show is for anyone who has an interest in the historical and critical reading of the Bible, whether they are people of faith or not. The unHoly Bible project is a multiyear project in which I take a critical look at the stories, events and other content found in the Bible. I go through this content in the order they are presented in the Bible, starting from the first Chapter of Genesis right through to the last chapter of Revelation. While I am not a Biblical scholar, I will be discussing this material through the lens of the scholarly consensus.

episodes.title: 7 Reasons Why People Stay as PIMO Jehovah's Witnesses (and Why None of Them Are Good)
episodes.description:
In this video Chaka discusses 7 reasons why people who no longer believe in the Jehovah's Witnesses' teachings stay in the religion (staying PIMO) and provides arguments as to why none of these are good reasons. Chaka also gives suggestions as to how to overcome these 7 barriers to leaving. 

#jehovahswitnesses #pimo #exjehovahswitness 

Chaka is a qualified and professional psychological therapist and the content on this channel addresses some mental health issues arising from the Jehovah's Witnesses teachings. Chaka also addresses issues faced by Black and Black African Jehovah's Witnesses.

To contact Chaka regarding issues raised on this channel email: television2087@gmail.com 
Visit Chaka's website: cbtconsultancy.com

episodes.title: Why I Left The Jehovah's Witnesses Religion: An Inside Story
episodes.description:
In this video Chaka Yumba, a recently defected ex-Jehovah's Witness elder, regular pioneer, SKE graduate and former HLC member tells the full story of why he joined the religion and why and how he eventually exited the religion.

#jehovahswitnesses #exjw #exjehovahswitness 

This channel is a resource for anyone interested in scrutinising the beliefs of Jehovah's Witnesses and gaining an insight into how decisions are reached by Jehovah's Witness elders. 

Chaka is a qualified and professional psycho logical therapist and the content on this channel addresses mental health issues arising from the Jehovah's Witnesses teachings. Chaka also addresses issues faced by Black and Black African Jehovah's Witnesses.

To contact Chaka regarding issues raised on this channel email: television2087@gmail.com
